views.markdown:
-Removed some c hooks that might be causing the login issues -Fix safe mode crash

-Compatible with Snapchat 10.6.2.0 -Fix for crash of stories on SC 9.42.0.0
-Added ability to autosave stories
-Fix crash when uploading from gallery
-Fix ability to swipe up on your own story to view snaps
-Fix ability to preview filters

-Fix for Snapchat 9.41.0

-Fix for crash when viewing snaps -Fixed hiding discover stories
-Fix launch issues for some users
-Re-organized settings
Version 1.6r-21
-Fix for crash on Snapchat 9.32.0
version: 1.5r-96
changes:
- Compatible with Snapchat 9.29.1.0
- Added option to autosave incoming snaps for specific friends only :)
version: 1.5r-86
changes:
Compatible with Snapchat 9.25.1.0
You can now preview filters before you use them. Please go to Snap + Settings -> Filter and Face Settings -> Enable the "Preview Filters on Camera" option
version: 1.5r-75
changes:
-You can now view and use remote filters created by the community
-Works with latest uasharedtools
v1.5-67 Changes:
-Renamed: Snap + for SnapChat
-You can now add Custom Filters!!! Go to Snap + Settings -> Filter and Face Settings -> Manage Available Filters -> Click the button on the top right :)
-Battery issues should also be fixed
Version: 1.5r-49
Changes: Updated to work with v9.21.0.1 of Snapchat. Lenses are disabled for now. Please email me with issues. I am working to make it fully compatible.
